newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Oklahoma feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was at a standstill in the panhandle area late Tuesday. Slaughter steers and heifers were not tested at the close.
Feedlots reported light inquiry from buyers. 16,300 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 15,400 formulated cattle to be shipped this week and 10 loads or 400 head of CME cattle.
Confirmed: None Week Ago: 300 Year Ago: 900
Wk to Date: 16,300 Week Ago: 20,500 Year Ago: 13,700
